The claim alleges that Gov: Kay Ivey gave nearly $1 million of taxpayers' money to a liberal activist organization that promotes alternative lifestyles and transgenderism.
The organization in question is Free2Be: a non-profit that provides counseling services to LGBTQ victims of domestic violence and bullying in Alabama.
The claim is based on the calculation th: 762,042.37 in federal grants since Ivey assumed office in April 2017.
The grants were primarily funded by the: which refunded expenses incurred by the organization.
